Text:
So, this release is in english both menu and ingame text?
Anyone has it tested to confirm?
Yes, menus, ingame text and speech is in english and german.
LOL MAN. WHERE IS THE CRACK? i have install the game. but he need activation code. :S HELP
Crack is in TiNYiSO folder on DVD.

Game is legit. Crack works fine. Text and speech both in English. Just don't compare this to God of War. Controls suck a bit but it is a good try. Enjoy.

6/10

Warning to Windows 7 x64 users! The game will crash your computer on install/mount due to Microsoft's Driver Signature Enforcement! There is an override application online that can bypass this... I hope this helps someone, as it did for me.

@Wisher_SiD
If you downloaded one of the un-rarred torrents I'd run some malware scans cause it was infected, caused a BSOD and injected to MBR.
game keep crashing after i installed it i need help
